timeline.message: Use gRPC Status for thrown exceptions too and remove redundant legacy status attributes.

timeline.body: If there is throwable, you will end up calling setStatus twice. And it seems like second one will override one set in `onError`

timeline.body:
i think calling straight to `onComplete` here would be a bit clearer
```suggestion
    onComplete(span, Status.fromThrowable(throwable), throwable);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
i think calling straight to onComplete here would be a bit clearer

Suggested change
onClose(span, Status.fromThrowable(throwable));
onComplete(span, Status.fromThrowable(throwable), throwable);
timeline.author: trask

replies.bodyText:
Yeah not sure if I have a preference. Happy to make the change, but want to confirm you think it's better even though it needs to be this longer version (convert to otel status)?
onComplete(span, GrpcHelper.statusFromGrpcStatus(Status.fromThrowable(throwable)), throwable);
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: oh yeah, that's not great, keep it as is 👍
